NF.Q: Which countries in the ridgeline chart have ridgeline peaks exceed 290944? Please list the countries and corresponding peak values.
NF.A: {Rural Areas}'s peak at {755756},{Metropolitan Areas}'s peak at {647648},{Suburbs}'s peak at {792793},{Coastal Properties}'s peak at {438438}

NF.Q: Which countries in the ridgeline chart have ridgeline peaks below 340764? Please list the countries and corresponding peak values.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Metropolitan Areas or Mountain Regions?
NC.A: {Metropolitan Areas} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Urban Redevelopment Areas or Rural Areas?
NC.A: {Rural Areas} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Coastal Properties or Suburbs?
NC.A: {Suburbs} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Mountain Regions or Luxury Residences?
NC.A: {Mountain Regions} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

MSR.Q: How many ridges have their peak located to the right of the average X value across all ridges?
MSR.A: There are {3} ridges whose peaks are located to the right of the average X value.

MSR.Q: What is the label of the ridge with the largest span along the mountain height?
